title: Prawn teriyaki

default: 1 tomato, top cut off, flesh scooped out

steps: Mix the prawns and teriyaki marinade in a bowl.
Heat a chargrill pan until hot and cook the prawns for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the prawns have turned pink and are cooked through.
To serve, hook the prawns over the edge of the hollowed out-tomato and garnish with the lime half.
